author: George Humphreys
title: Mosaic: fNFT Native Token Mint
description: NFT's stagnate because of high prices, limiting access, artist royalties, and price discovery. Fractional NFT's democratize premium assets.
solution: Mint fractional NFT's: Liquidity spurs price discovery, volume increases royalties, shared ownership promotes communities & accessibility.
experience: Collective 25+ years in devops, NFT artists & collectors, Ethereum Development (Kleros, Recover, GameCoin), Haskell, Plutus Pioneer Program.
